meanings.sent1: Lack of exercise enfeebles the muscles over time.
meanings.sent2: The illness enfeebles the body's ability to fight off infections.
meanings.sent3: Eating only candy enfeebles your body's ability to stay healthy.
meanings.sent4: Constant worry enfeebles the mind more than any physical ailment.
meanings.sent5: The lack of sunlight enfeebles the plant, causing it to wither and die.

meanings.definition: Weakens or diminishes in strength or vitality.
meanings.sent1: The harsh weather enfeebles the old tree, making it more susceptible to disease.
meanings.sent2: Lack of sleep enfeebles our ability to concentrate and think clearly.
meanings.sent3: Skipping meals enfeebles our energy levels, leaving us tired and irritable.
meanings.sent4: Negative thoughts enfeebles our resolve to overcome challenges.
meanings.sent5: The constant noise pollution enfeebles our sense of peace and tranquility.
